tasks.label: Run Verilog Simulation
args: iverilog -g2012 -o simulation_bin.out DataPath.v ALU.v register.v Bus.v adder.v and_or.v tutorial_tb.v && vvp simulation_bin.out && gtkwave waveforms.vcd

tasks.label: Test ALU
args: cd Phase1 && iverilog -g2012 -o alu_test.out ALU.v ALU_tb.v adder.v and_or.v NRDivider.v && vvp alu_test.out && gtkwave wave.vcd
